paper_title: Effect of ice nucleating proteins on the structure-property relationships of ice: A molecular dynamics study

claims.claim: The ratio of hexagonal to cubic ice (Ih/Ic) in the well-equilibrated ice structure without ice-nucleating proteins (INPs) is significantly higher than that in the ice structure containing two INPs
instruction: Open the final well-equilibrated microstructures W_Tr0.cfg and 2INP_Tr2.cfg in OVITO
Apply the CHILL+ structural identification modifier to each configuration to compute the fractions of hexagonal ice (Ih) and cubic ice (Ic)
Verify that the Ih/Ic fraction is approximately 0.62 for W_Tr0.cfg and approximately 0.39 for 2INP_Tr2.cfg
